instruction: Generate a conversation between two characters by explaining the following statement.
input: Sam was feeling very guilty because he knew he was wrong.
output:
Sam: "I know I was wrong. I feel so guilty."

Emily: "Why do you feel guilty? What happened?"

Sam: "I did something that I knew was wrong and now I'm feeling really bad about it."

Emily: "It's ok. We all make mistakes sometimes. You just have to learn from it and move on."
